products.title: Urban Metallic Silver Curtain
products.description: Urban comes in several modern grey and cream shades, this hopsack range adds modern simplicity to your kitchen or bedroom. Urban tales on a metallic appearance the light hits the fabric, adding more depth to this textured fabric. On the lighter end of the grey spectrum, urban silver allows the addition of a soft grey-toned fabric without being too dark or over-bearing. Perfect for retaining a light and airy theme whilst adding some colour.

products.title: Faux Suede White Curtain
products.description: Their faux suede range of fabric has proven to be one of their most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous roman blinds and curtains. The faux suede white curtain in a lovelycolour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. products.title: Geometric Metallic Denim Blue Roman Blind
products.description: This textured geometric fabric is simple yet effective at creative depth, whilst adding a soft pop of colour to your home. Your new geometric metallic denim blue roman blind, blends a trend dark blue shade with interwoven reflective silver threadwork to help create a modern, inspiring final look. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why your new roman blind comes with a fabulous five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind.
